TopicTitle: Tales of the Groundbound: The OST

Articles.Content:
What if the "Tales of the Groundbound" was a TV series? What would the soundtrack consist of? Alas, I am no where near creative or skilled enough to compose and conduct enough music for the task. Fortunately, there are those who have made some.

Volume 1

1. Opening Theme (Dauntless by Audiomachine)

2. Ending Theme (Men of Honour by Two Steps From Hell)

3. KSC Theme (Big Country by Audiomachine)

4. Halls of Research (Proud Heritage by Epic Score)

5. To the Launchpad (War is Coming By Epic Score)

6. Return to Kerbin (Prevail by Audiomachine)

7. Signal Lost (Black Sunrise by Audiomachine)

8. The Reels (Run from Brain Powerd OST)

9. Acrobatics (Winterspell by Two Steps From Hell)

10. Countdown and Launch (A Bit(e) of Hope from Vampire Hunter D: Bloodlust)

11. Building the Birds (Throw off the Bowlines by James Paget)

12. Flight In, RTB (This Is Our Land by Epic Score)

13. SaR Flight (From Beneath the Rubble by Audiomachine)

14. Riding a Dragon Down (Ocean Princess by Thomas Bergersen)

15. Press Presentation (Never Give Up On Your Dream by Two Steps From Hell)

16. Casey, We Have A Problem (Durant is Dead from The Black Hole)

Distributed by  K-Tel Records, available at all major retailers.

Volume 2

  1. Supply Pod Arrives (Victorious Return by Epic Score)
  2. Insertion Burn (Guardians by Two Steps From Hell) 
  3. Morning On The Prairie (Love's Inclination by Approaching Nirvana)
  4. Old Empire Society (Breakfast at Cheetah's by Approaching Nirvana)
  5. Flagship Launch (World Border by Approaching Nirvana)
  6. Unveiling The Bird (I Pledge Allegiance by Audiomachine)
  7. Wernher's Answer (Intrepid Souls  by Audiomachine)
  8. Wernher's Labs (Aguirre's Fugue from Inca OST)
  9. Building The Prairie (Eternal Memories by Epic Score)
  10. Flurry of Designs (Deceit and Betrayal by Audiomachine)
  11. High Altitude Tourists (Do You Believe In Dreams? from Eat-man OST)
  12. A Pause Before Ignition (Don't Forget to Breath from Forbidden Kingdom OST)
  13. Fishing From The Weir (Sungrazer by Two Steps From Hell)
  14. Interesting Idea Or Interesting Kerbal (Cherry Blossoms by Approaching Nirvana)
  15. Tearing Around The Complex (Treasure Hunt by Audiomachine)
  16. Orbital Assembly (Impossible by Two Steps From Hell)
  17. Building the Clockwerk Computer (The Seeker of the Prophecy from Forbidden Kingdom OST)

Distributed by  K-Tel Records, available at all major retailers.
